vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.5.32;
son of: Noah (H5146);
brother of: Ham (H2526) and Japheth (H3315);
father of: Asshur (H0804H), Elam (H5867C), Arpachshad (H0775), Lud (H3865) and Aram (H0758)
Also named: Sēm<\i> (Σήμ "Shem" G4590)
§ Shem = "name"
the eldest son of Noah and progenitor of the Semitic tribes
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
閃 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "名字"
挪亞的大兒子, 閃族人的祖先
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
闪 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "名字"
挪亚的大儿子, 闪族人的祖先
